00634       if (in_buf[i_in - 1] != crc8(in_buf, i_in - 1)) {
00635          i_in = 0;
00636          return;                // return if CRC code does not match
00637       }
00638 
00639       interprete();             // interprete command
00640       i_in = 0;
00641    }
00642 }

00868            the watchdog issues a reset
